moves.name: X Attack All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Stand Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Defense and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: Clearheaded
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

passives.name: Natural Remedy
passives.description: Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.

passives.name: Endurance
passives.description: If the Pokémon enters battle with full HP, allows it to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.
